channel.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
channel.description:
I know this is a not typical question but I suspect you guys might just have a simpler answer than some I have found on my own.
Just how much time passed between the G-Man putting you into limbo/stasis at the end of Half-life 1 and you finding your sorry bum on a train with two guys in blue clothes complaining about relocation in HL2?

item.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
item.dc:creator: EksCelle
item.description:
XenoSpyro:

I always considered it a baby picture of Gordon given to him from his parents.

No, it’s actually a picture of one of the developer’s baby daughter, if I am not mistaken.

Read full topic
item.source: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?

item.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
item.dc:creator: XenoSpyro
item.description:
Mr.Night:
Kairouseki:

Alyx was the picture in Gordon’s locker

Wrong. That’s not Alyx. It’s just an Easter Egg.

I always considered it a baby picture of Gordon given to him from his parents.

Read full topic
item.source: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?

item.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
item.dc:creator: tonkat
item.description:
Mona Simpson
“how many roads must a man walk down before you can call him a man?”

Homer
“7!”

Lisa
“da…d …its a rhetorical question”

Homer
“rhetorical ey? …8!”

after reading this whole thread thats all im taking from it.

Read full topic
item.source: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?

item.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
She looks younger than 7, lol; About 2 or 3.

That would make her about 22-23ish when Gordon is 27.
But considering that Alyx doesn’t know about Gman’s stasis, I’d say she probably thinks Gordon is 47.

…

Read full topic
item.source: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?

item.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
There is a photo of Alyx (as a young child), Eli and his wife, Azian. Azian was killed during the aftermath of the Resonance Cascade and only Eli and Alyx survived along with the photo. There can only be a certain amount of time (say, 20 years) between the Alyx in the photo and the Alyx you meet pummeling the Metrocops.

Read full topic
item.source: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?

item.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
item.dc:creator: Artic_Xiongmao
item.description:
When HL2 was released there wasn’t any PR statement about it but someone at Valve, I think, said it was 10 years. Then the Aftermath / Episode One webpage said it was ‘two decades.’ So there is your official statement, I guess.

Read full topic
item.source: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?

item.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
I realize this. That’s why I said assumption. But I’m pretty sure that’s what the plot difference is based on, I don’t think it’s been officially stated.

Read full topic
item.source: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?

item.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
item.dc:creator: Mr.Night
item.description:
Kairouseki:

I think that number is based on the assumption that Alyx was the picture in Gordon’s locker and comparing their ages between the two games.

Wrong. That’s not Alyx. It’s just an Easter Egg.

Read full topic
item.source: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?

item.title: How long between HL1 Plot and HL2?
item.dc:creator: Joseph557
item.description:
GenericPlayerX:

I know this is a not typical question but I suspect you guys might just have a simpler answer than some I have found on my own.

  Just how much time passed between the G-Man putting you into limbo/stasis at the end of Half-life 1 and you finding your sorry bum on a train with two guys in blue clothes complaining about relocation in HL2?

Twenty years Aylx is 7 in Half-Life 1 Freeman is 27 so after 20 years in stasis Gordon and Ms Vance are both twenty seven, therfore a ‘more than friends’ relationship is quite likely in a future HL installment.

Read full topic
